title: Short-Intensive CBL-Based Course for Enhancing Leadership Self-Awareness

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental self-reflection experience and career in performing leadership roles
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based mobile learning environment, combined with real-time mentoring sessions.

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more specific leadership strengths and improvement areas by analyzing real workplace cases
Learners improve self-awareness levels by 20% or more when exchanging feedback with peers through scaffolding support
Learners apply methods to objectify self-responses in conflict management situations through case-based learning activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
